resources:
Usage Logger 2 Logging Service with Notifications Logging Service
Collecting data about what apps\nyou have installed etc. Collecting data about what you\nare using your phone for now Collecting data about what you\npreviously used your phone for
Study is complete Setup in progressâ€¦
Please press on the READ QR-CODE button to scan a QR-Code associated with the study. The only remaining step is to send the data to the researcher by email. Do you wish to send the data now? There was a problem reading the QR-Code. Please scan the code again. Much effort has gone into securing the data that this app collects. Ultimately, you have full control of your data. It will not be shared with anyone unless you explicitly email or export the data. \n\nHowever, if the phone is rooted (jail-broken), or if you believe the security on the phone is compromised, please do not participate in this study. In order to participate, you will need to grant the following permissions:\n
- Collect usage data - Collect notification data - Show notifications - No extra permissions needed
To configure this app for the study you are participating in, a QR-Code needs to be scanned. Please allow the app to access the phone\'s camera. The app would like to inform you when it\'s collection information in the background. Please allow the app to show you notifications.
The study you are taking part in needs you to grant \"usage\" permissions.\n\nThis allows the app to collect information about what you have used the phone for, currently, and previously, and when the screen has been on or off. The study you are taking part in needs you to grant permissions for \"notifications\".\n\nThis means the app will collect information about when you receive and when you delete notifications. All setup steps have been completed and all essential permissions have been given.>
What is this app for? Attention! Next step What information will be collected? Send email? Issue Reading QR-Code Your password is:
Collect usage data? Required permissions Use Camera? Collect notification data? Show notifications? Setup completed!
Data security
This app is has been developed for research purposes. If you are not participating in a research study, please uninstall this app now. This app helps researchers learn about how you are using your phone. Please do not use this app for other purposes.\n\nIf you have been asked to use this app for purposes unrelated to scientific research, please uninstall it now. At this point no data has been collected.
The app is now configured to collect the following information:
Contextual information: • Apps installed on the phone. • Permissions that apps requested. • Responses to permission requested.
Current, ongoing, information: • When the phone is restarted. • When the screen is off or on. • What apps you use and when. • When notifications are shown. • When you install or delete an app.
Usage in the last days, including: • When the screen was on or off. • When and what apps were used.
While no information is collected on what you did with apps installed on the phone, inferences might be made. Press OK if you are happy that this data will be collected. If not, please contact the researcher and consider withdrawing from the study.
Close App See Password Read QR-Code Usage Logger 2 - Research data Click READ QR-CODE Collecting data, excluding notifications Collecting data, including notifications
